title: {{m|Blink}} {{y|Mutation}}
description:
Adds a physical alternative to teleport that blinks you a short distance in one of the orthogonal directions.

Also adds a bunch of homages to everyone's favourite {{B|blue}} speedy-boi, and his edgy purple class-mate (oc).
author: {{K-g-G-Y-G-g-K alternation|UnderDoug}}
